name: Vilniaus Centro advokatų kontora LAW BOUTIQUE
membership: Vilnius Centre Law Firm LAW BOUTIQUE advocate Ms Vytautė Ladigaitė-Balčiūnienė is a member of Lithuanian Bar Association.
goal:
Vilnius Centre Law Firm LAW BOUTIQUE provides legal services which are based on long years of professional experience, transparency, clarity, respect of interests of our clients and technological innovations.
Acting under the brand name LAW BOUTIQUE we provide high-quality niche legal services to natural persons, small and medium sized businesses. This type of service is referred to as a „solo“ practice, which  is highly valued by clients.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Vilnius Centre Law Firm LAW BOUTIQUE follows all initiatives to modernise the intellectual property framework, Copyright and Neighbouring Rights, developments of EU Laws and policies regarding Digital Single Market and data protection on the internet. In its everyday activities LAW BOUTIQUE focuses on protection and enforcement of copyright on the internet.
